rooms.name: entrance_hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance with a welcoming vestibule, adhering to Vastu principles by aligning the door in a favorable direction.

rooms.name: living_area
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows, natural light, and an industrial aesthetic using exposed materials such as concrete and steel.

rooms.name: home_office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office with ample workspace, designed for productivity and concentration, isolated from the living area for privacy.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Modern industrial kitchen featuring clean lines, stainless steel appliances, and efficient layout with easy access to dining area if needed.

rooms.name: library
rooms.description: A quiet library space designed for reading and study, incorporating bookshelves integrated into the wall structure and ambient lighting, adhering to Vastu by ensuring calm energy in the northeast corner.

openings.name: north_entrance
openings.description: North-facing entrance door with ample natural light, aligning with Vastu principles for a positive flow of energy.

openings.name: floor_to_ceiling_windows
openings.description: Large windows spanning the full height of the living area walls to maximize natural light and create an industrial look with exposed structure.
